definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

sentences.english: Turn to Isaiah 26:3 and believe it today.
sentences.chinese: 翻阅以赛亚书二十六章3节，并立志信靠它。

sentences.english: The Holy Spirit indwells every believer in Christ.
sentences.chinese: 圣灵内住在每一位信靠基督的信徒里。

sentences.english: The other lost his life to win the whole world's faith.
sentences.chinese: 一位舍掉生命却赢得世人的信靠。

sentences.english: How do we know Elisha was trusting God?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何知道以利沙在信靠神呢？

sentences.english: We are to simply trust God.
sentences.chinese: 我们所要做的祇是信靠仰赖神。

sentences.english: How I love to trust in Jesus, Just to trust take Him at His word.
sentences.chinese: 信靠耶稣真是甜美，只要信靠主宝血。

sentences.english: How I love to trust in Jesus, Just to trust take Him at His word.
sentences.chinese: 信靠耶稣真是甜美，只要信靠主宝血。

sentences.english: The psalmist teaches us instead to trust.
sentences.chinese: 反而，诗人教导我们要信靠。

sentences.english: Godly goals are set through faith.
sentences.chinese: 属神的人制定的目标，必须是通过信靠神才能完成的。

sentences.english: Trust I seek and I find in you.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在寻找信靠并在你里面找到了。

sentences.english: I will put my life into his hands. I will trust him with my life.
sentences.chinese: 我要把生命交在祂手里，一生信靠祂。

sentences.english: Faith in Christ will keep us steady in the stormy sea of change.
sentences.chinese: 生命虽经狂风骤雨，信靠基督使我们安稳无惧。

sentences.english: God listens as people rise within the congregation of believers to declare faith and allegiance to God.
sentences.chinese: 神听著会众中有人站起来，表示信靠及尽忠于神。

sentences.english: Words of life and beauty, Teach me faith and duty.
sentences.chinese: 美哉生命之道，教我忠诚信靠。

sentences.english: Believe in God ALL THE TIME and you will enrich and strengthen your life in ALL situations.
sentences.chinese: 无论何时，信靠上帝，都会使你的生命变得丰丰满满。

sentences.english: The time to trust is when all else fails.
sentences.chinese: 当一切都无可靠的时候，才是信靠神的时候。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
